task.summary: adjustable gravity - slopes and stairs handled
vertical velocity now preserved and not reset every frame
default grounded value should be true

- gravity and jumpForce lerp instead of constant velocity - fall animation logic changed (displacement value now normalized to support dynamic limits) - extra down force now only applied only when cast is true.
